snippet: Julian Wachner, Trinity Church’s music director, presided over a concert of recent sacred works by Nico Muhly, with oldies by Herbert Howells and William Byrd.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews concert of choral works by Nico Muhly and other composers performed by the Trinity Choir, conducted by Julian Wachner, at St Paul's Chapel.
lead_paragraph: Julian Wachner, Trinity Church’s music director, presided over a concert of recent sacred works by Nico Muhly, with oldies by Herbert Howells and William Byrd.

headline.seo: Trinity Choir in Nico Muhly Works at St. Paul’s Chapel
headline.main: On an Evening of Wilting Heat, the Soaring Harmonies of Sacred Works
headline.print_headline: On an Evening of Wilting Heat, the Soaring Harmonies of Sacred Works
